title: Large Language Model Chatbot-Enhanced Social Learning Achievement Program for Middle School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. Designing social studies learning activities via VR simulations in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Students can achieve over 80% completion of social studies assignments using large language model-based chatbots.
Learners can improve their knowledge restructuring and application skills by 30% based on chatbot usage experiences.
Over 70% of participating students record a satisfaction score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) regarding technology-enhanced learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
